title: 6g internal error when trying to declare a constant with value nil
body:
1. What is a short input program that triggers the error?

package main
const c = nil

2. What is the full compiler output?

test.go:2: internal compiler error: dumpexportconst: unknown ctype: c 6

3. What version of the compiler are you using?  (Run it with the -V flag.)

6g version 6154+
